File.AllUsersWebPart:
<WebPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2">
                    	<Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=15.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly>
                        <TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ContentEditorWebPart</TypeName>
                        <Title>$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_Title;</Title>
                        <Content xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor">                            
                            $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP;
                            <br/>
                            <br/>
                            <span id="errFeatureDisabled" style="display:none">
                              $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWPErrTitle;
                              <ul>
                                <li id="featureIpr" >$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWPErrIPR;</li>
                                <li id="featureDoc" >$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWPErrDoc;</li>
                              </ul>
                            </span>
                            $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP2;
                            <ul>
                                <li>$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_Bullet1; <a href="_layouts/15/mngctype.aspx">$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_CreateCT;</a> - $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_CreateCTDesc;</li>
                                <li>$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_Bullet2; <a href="_layouts/15/create.aspx">$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_CreateLib;</a> - $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_CreateLibDesc;</li>
                                <li>$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_Bullet3; <a href="$Resources:dlccore,RoutingRuleList_ListFolder;">$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_CreateRules;</a> - $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_CreateRulesDesc;</li>
                                <li>$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_Bullet4; <a href="default.aspx">$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_ConfigHomePage;</a> - $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_ConfigHomePageDesc;</li>
                            </ul>
                            $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleInitialSetupWP_Close;
                            <script language="javascript">showHideError(); </script>
                        </Content>
                    </WebPart>
File.View: <webParts> <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3"> <metaData> <type name="Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.XsltListViewWebPart,Microsoft.SharePoint,Version=15.0.0.0,Culture=neutral,PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c" /> <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage> </metaData> <data> <properties> <property name="ChromeType" type="chrometype">TitleOnly</property> </properties> </data> </webPart> </webParts>
File.AllUsersWebPart:
<WebPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2">
                        <Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=15.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly>
                        <TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ContentEditorWebPart</TypeName>
                        <Title>$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_Title;</Title>
                        <Content xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor">
                          <ul class="rclink">                            
                            <li><a href="_layouts/15/create.aspx">$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_CreateLib;</a> - $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_CreateLibDesc;</li>
                            <li><a href="_layouts/15/sitemanager.aspx">$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_SiteMngr;</a> - $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_SiteMngrDesc;</li>
                            <li><a href="$Resources:dlccore,RoutingRuleList_ListFolder;">$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_CreateRules;</a> - $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_CreateRulesDesc;</li>
                            <li><a href="_layouts/15/searchAndAddToHold.aspx">$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_Hold;</a> - $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_HoldDesc;</li>
                            <li><a href=javascript:getFilePlanReportLink();>$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_FP;</a> - $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_FPDesc;</li>
                            <li><a href="javascript:STSNavigate(&quot;~SiteCollection/_layouts/15/Reporting.aspx?Category=Auditing&quot;);">$Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_Audit;</a> - $Resources:dlccore, RCConsoleTasksWP_AuditDesc;</li>
                          </ul>
                        </Content>
                    </WebPart>
